params.paymentAddress: the address to which rewards should be sent if successful
params.sarcoId: The identifier of the sarcophagus having leaked shards
params.unencryptedShardHashes: At least 'm' unencrypted shard hashes as proof of bad behaviour

params.paymentAddress: The address to which rewards will be sent
params.sarcoId: The identifier of the sarcophagus to clean

accuse(bytes32,bytes32[],address).notice: Accuse archaeologoists of bad behaviour, by providing proof of leaked unencrypted shards before a sarcophagus is ready to be unwrapped. The minumum number of shards required to unwrap the sarcophagus should be provided for a a successful accusal. of the cursed bonds of the archs back to them, and un-curses their bonds.

clean(bytes32,address).notice: Close a sarcophagus that has not been unwrapped within its grace period
